txt.en: 'With each new foray into Eryn Lasgalen, the Taurogrim work to ravage the land. They slaughter the beasts of the forest and defile the trees. \n\n'If you discover any trees bearing the scars of their wrath, spread this salve upon them. It will not undo the hurts of the Taurogrim, but they will heal in time.'
Thranduil can be found in Felegoth.\n\nYou should talk to Thranduil.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing 'Restoring the Three Kingdoms' will cancel this quest</rgb>
Scarred trees can be found near Tholk√°t in Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should heal scarred trees with the salve given to you by Thranduil.
The Taurogrim are a destructive force, poisoning wildlife and destroying plants as they spread.
Spread healing salve on scarred trees ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'I have experienced great loss in my time, but such needless destruction cannot go unanswered. The Taurogrim must know that my people are the true masters of Eryn Lasgalen.\n\n'Thank you, [placeholder].'
Spread healing salve on scarred trees ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
